# /NOLOGO (EDITBIN)
```  
/NOLOGO  
```  
  
## Remarks  
 This option suppresses display of the EDITBIN copyright message and version number.  
  
## See Also  
 [EDITBIN Options](../../build/reference/editbin-options.md)
